definition: to grant/to give/to bestow/to act/to carry out

sentences.english: Xerox' is a proprietary name and may not be used by other makers of photocopiers.
sentences.chinese: 施樂＇爲專利名稱，製造複印機的其他廠家不得采用。

sentences.english: Q. You led a turnaround at Xerox earlier this decade.
sentences.chinese: 你在近十年的早些時候，領導施樂公司實現了轉型。

sentences.english: And so we have many things in Xerox research.
sentences.chinese: 所以我們在施樂有許多活動。

sentences.english: Xerox has a long history of innovation.
sentences.chinese: 施樂有很長的創新歷史。

sentences.english: This has been going on for decades of Xerox, which I really appreciate.
sentences.chinese: 施樂這個傳統有幾十年的歷史了，我也很欣賞這一點。

sentences.english: May I use the Xerox machine because I have to make some copies?
sentences.chinese: 因爲我要複印點東西，我可以用一下施樂複印機嗎？

sentences.english: Now let me give you the Xerox market context.
sentences.chinese: 現在讓我給大家一些施樂的市場背景。

sentences.english: Fuji Xerox's businesses have been dramatically changing.
sentences.chinese: 富士施樂的業務一直在不斷髮展變化。

sentences.english: The Xerox cuts were the latest sign of growing unease in technology.
sentences.chinese: 施樂的裁員再次顯示了科技行業的不安日益加劇。
